Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, one half of the interior is covered with grey-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394237) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394237)
